verbs.description: [ARG1: Some sports journalists] [V: were] [ARG2: outraged at an idea being floated at an NFL meeting to punish players who might kneel during the national anthem before each game] . Here 's the controversial suggestion According to Sports Illustrated , owners were considering the suggestion that home teams would be allowed to choose whether both teams were allowed to line up for the national anthem , but then would be subject to a 15-yard penalty if anyone kneeled in protest . The suggestion was reportedly made during a three - hour meeting about the subject of national anthem protesting , which became a controversy that engulfed the football league during the 2017 season . Even President Donald Trump weighed in on the protests during a September rally in Pennsylvania . After he excoriated players who participated in the demonstrations , the protests exploded in number the next Sunday , with many players citing his criticism for their change of heart . What was the response ? The suggestion was not greeted warmly …
